name: Bogglecat Box
description:
End Phase: Deal 1 Anemo DMG.
Usage(s): 2

When your active character takes DMG: Decreases DMG taken by 1. (Once per Round)
When your character(s) take Cryo/Hydro/Pyro/Electro DMG: Change the Elemental Type of this card to the element of the damage taken. (Once before leaving play)
